pullRequest.title: [CDAP-16359] Integrate with nextruntime batch API from backend for pipelines
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA: https://issues.cask.co/browse/CDAP-16359
Build: https://builds.cask.co/browse/CDAP-UDUT522-1
Pending: Add E2E tests for pipelines list view.
Required backend changes available in latest develop (#11899)

commit.message:
[CDAP-16359] Integrate with nextruntime batch API from backend for pipelines

  - Adds nextRuntime to PipelineRecord in Graphql
  - Fixes PipelineList view to batch calls for getting next runtime

beforeCommit.message: Fixes PipelineList view to batch calls for getting next runtime

afterCommit.message:
